column4: I just clicked on a google link that "did a free virus scan".. but that's not what the link said it was.. now the link says I've got all kinds of spyware.... what a joke! Not possible.. http://antvirushelp.com/2009/1/_freescan.php?id=880461
wow it says i have spyware too :P
you can get this really good antivirus/antispyware disk from http://ubuntu.com
Funny.. I've passed that very same link around to lots of people with little result.. But I did get results!  2 installs in the last 2 months.. not great but more than none! :)
